cyclone.name: LAURA
cyclone.current_location: about 360 miles SSE of Lake Charles, Louisiana
cyclone.trajectory: tracking northwest toward the upper Texas and southwest Louisiana Gulf Coast
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: near the Texas-Louisiana border (around Cameron, LA)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Storm-surge watch Freeport TX to San Luis Pass TX; Mouth of the Mississippi River to Ocean Springs MS; Lake Pontchartrain/Maurepas/Borgne
weather_observation.warning_coast: Storm-surge warning San Luis Pass TX to Mouth of the Mississippi River; Hurricane warning San Luis Pass TX to Intracoastal City LA; Tropical-storm warning Sargent TX to San Luis Pass TX and east of Intracoastal City LA to Mouth of the Mississippi River
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Upper Texas and western Louisiana coasts, with inland impacts spreading northward through Louisiana and Arkansas
